snippet.title: Chocoholic? Try Dan's Delicious Chocolates!
snippet.description: Still looking for a Mother's Day gift? Oh, you've already got it covered? Okay then, here's a suggestion for the next holiday where a gift of calorie-laden, endorphin-producing chocolates are appropriate. I love Dan's C...

snippet.title: How to Look Good in Family Photos
snippet.description: Looking at your family photos should fill you with joy. Unfortunately, many of us instead cringe as we concentrate on only the flaws in our faces and figures. But you can enjoy your memories more if you follow these fiv...

snippet.title: Satiny Chocolate Sauce
snippet.description: This chocolate sauce is rich and satiny, deeply chocolatey and gorgeous, and it takes less than 5 minutes to make. Get Catherine Newman's delicious recipe here.

snippet.title: How to Look Good in Family Photos
snippet.description: Looking at your family photos should fill you with joy. Unfortunately, many of us instead cringe as we concentrate on only the flaws in our faces and figures. But you can enjoy your memories more if you follow these fiv...

snippet.title: White Chocolate and Orange Truffles
snippet.description: These rich, delectable no-bake truffles find the perfect flavor balance between sweet white chocolate and zesty orange. Get Anne Coleman's irresistible recipe here.

snippet.title: The Best Hot Chocolate
snippet.description: When was the last time you had real hot chocolate? You know what I mean, not that powdery stuff in a packet with crunchy little marshamallows. It doesn't count if someone made it for you, either. I just came off of a qu...

snippet.title: Chocolate Dump Cake
snippet.description: My husband is just as much a coffee lover as I am. Since we're also chocolate lovers and nothing goes better with coffee than chocolate, I like whipping up this super easy cake -- I don't have time for more right now!

snippet.title: Cherry-Pumpkin Seed Chocolate Bark
snippet.description: This is the grown-up variation of chocolate bark: sweet, tart, spicy, salty, and profoundly addictive. It's lots of fun to make, with plenty of lovely little jobs for kids to do. Add festive wrapping, and you've got a g...

snippet.title: Amazing From-Scratch Hot Chocolate
snippet.description: This yummy homemade hot chocolate is rich and chocolatey, and ready in 5 minutes. Get Catherine Newman's quick and easy recipe here.
